content: During my school years, I learned Java and Python at the beginning of my first year.
I did not have any programming background when I entered university.
Therefore, the fastpaced academic life troubles me a lot.
Facing tremendous amount of stress, I squeezed out every tiny drop of time to learn those language and never thinking of giving up.
At the end of semester, what I gained is a good grade, famaliarity with the language as well as proficient analyzing and troubleshooting ability.
body_para.intro_sentence: my fast and adaptive learning compatibility, highly proficient programming ability among various languages
body_para.conclusion_sentence: my extensive experience with Java, Python and web development granted me with both outstanding programming and analytical skill

content: I worked as the Director in the media department at the university animation club
and was assigned with a huge workload of editing a promotional videos.
Upon receiving negative feedbacks on my work from the manager many times,
my positive attitude has helped me go through many trial and errors,
which promoted my final version to be verified eventually.
This precious experience will help me in this role by giving a tough and strong attitude
in solving problems when encountering inevitable setbacks.
body_para.intro_sentence: positive attitude towards work and life
body_para.conclusion_sentence: my outgoing character and optimistic attitude towards difficulties can tackle problems effectively

content: As a Junior software developer at PwC Shanghai AC,
I was responsible for hosting a meeting with a few senior developers and manager at Compliance department to determine the implementation of a secruity feature.
To get the job done, I carefully sent out invitation email and prepared briefing slides for knowledge transfer.
The meeting went well and every participant was able to understand the current situation and provided helpful suggestions.
After the meeting, I implementated the feature and passed the security assessment.
This task will benefit me in this role by giving me confidence and positive attitude towards challenges in professional workspace.
body_para.intro_sentence: experience hosting conference with multiple department coordinators
body_para.conclusion_sentence: my previous conference experience, empathic communication with clients can deliver crucial information efficiently and accurately

content: As a AI Back End Developer Intern at Intact Lab,
I was part of the infrastruture team that responsible for provide computing power to the data analysts in the Lab
We used Kubernetes to manage all the computing nodes and my manager assigned me some maintainance work.
At the beginning of the internship, the concept and technical detail of Kubernetes is relatively hard to learn,
but I eventually was able to write some scripts that does those jobs.
This internship will benefit me in this role by giving me decent amount of Kubernetes and DevOps experience.
body_para.intro_sentence: adaquent experience with Kubernetes and understadning of DevOps concept
body_para.conclusion_sentence: my previous internship granted me ability to quickly adapt to and utilize new technology stacks

content: I want to find some platforms that suits my personal needs: store technical blogs and photography works.
Among searching all the related products on the market, I didn't find a desirable choice, therefore I decided to build it on my own.
My previous internships and school projects gave me a good understanding of how to build a web project.
By doing things similar to Full-Stack developer, I eventually build my personal website using React and Flask.
I also hosted my website on my VPS and wrote some DevOps pipelines to deploy my site automatically.
body_para.intro_sentence: in-depth experience of being a Full-Stack developer in my casual time
body_para.conclusion_sentence: huge amount of time spent in building my website qualify me to work as a independent Full-Stack web developer

content: As a Junior software developer at PwC Shanghai AC,
my job is to work in a team that provide solutions to various clients and then build them using different technologies.
This gave me a lot of oppotunity to try different tech stack, Google App Script, VBA, selenium (automated web browser), React and Django.
There is a project where I was the main developer which I used wrote some scripts to perform a migration job that automatically copy large number of webpage content and paste them into google sheets.
This task will benefit me in this role by giving me fast and adaptive learning compatibility in professional workspace.
body_para.intro_sentence: experience building small scale project quickly with decent quality
body_para.conclusion_sentence: my previous internship granted me ability to quickly adapt to and utilize new technology stacks

body_para.description: Findindle technical (React Native, Expo, project management)
content: I worked as a part-time Full-Stack developer at my friend's company and built a cross-platform mobile app for around one and a half year.
I Took ownership of the entire backend by designing and utilizing a customized content management system in Node.js and I also contributed 1/3 of the frontend development using React Native and Expo.
We conducted agile practices and hosted standup meetings weekly to track project progress.
body_para.intro_sentence: experience working in a small agile team and develop with React Native
body_para.conclusion_sentence: my part-time job granted me adaquent amount of experience with React Native and knowledge of agile
